name: Affogato
storyline:
As a sorceress who's just arrived in Arorua, you must manage both your debt and the running of your coffee shop.
As a barista, you'll meet customers of all kinds and hear all the enchanting stories they have to tell.
And since you're a sorceress, you can use your arcane talents to travel right into their minds and uncover their deepest secrets.
summary: Affogato combines RPG and 'reversed tower defense' elements. You'll play as the titular Affogato, a sorceress managing a cafe in a new town. Meet all kinds of customers, hear their stories—and travel into their minds to defeat their inner demons. Experience a city life both everyday, and magical.
